Subject: The Inventor, The Improver!!!!!

MIME-Version: 1.0

From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

::Wheeljack::

	Wheeljack was laying down, in a cave, peacefully, with a warm, blazing
fire in front of him.  He had been in this large cave for a couple days
now.  It was his shelter out in the wild, but soon he would have much
better shelter in the Alliance base.  He got up, and decided to go find the
Alliance right now, so he transformed into his beast mode, a T-Rex, and
went stomping off.  He eventually came across the Alliance base after an
hour or so.

	"Ah, so this is my home on Earth.  Interesting!" He said as he transformed
into robot mode.

	Wheeljack grabbed his two plasma rifles and went running up to the hatch
excitedly, then started banging madly.

	"Let me in!  Let me in!  Hello, Alliance friends, now let me in!!" He
shouted with joy, while banging his fists on the hatch.
